name: AK-47
description: The AK47 Memorial Token is a digital tribute honoring those who have lost their lives to the widespread use of the AK-47 assault rifle in conflicts worldwide. With a limited supply mirroring the estimated number of AK-47 rifles in existence, this solana cryptocurrency symbolizes remembrance and solidarity. Through community engagement and advocacy efforts, the project aims to raise awareness about the human cost of armed violence and support initiatives for peacebuilding and conflict resolution
